verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,-ei deha tomā-sabākāra
yei tumi kaha, sei sammata āmāra

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; ei deha—this body; tomā-sabākāra—belongs to all of you; yei—whatever; tumi—you; kaha—say; sei—that; sammata āmāra—accepted by Me.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said, "My body belongs to all of you. Therefore I agree to whatever you say."
